lead_paragraph: Pyotr Pavlensky was taken to a hospital notorious for giving insanity diagnoses to political dissidents in the Soviet period, raising worries about a revival of politicized psychiatry.
snippet: Pyotr Pavlensky was taken to a hospital notorious for giving insanity diagnoses to political dissidents in the Soviet period, raising worries about a revival of politicized psychiatry.

headline.main: Russian Dissident Artist Is Said to Be Sent for Psychiatric Evaluation

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Serbsky State Scientific Center for Social and Forensic Psychiatry (Russia)

abstract: Russian authorities send performance artist Pyotr Pavlensky to Serbsky State Scientific Center for Social and Forensic Psychiatry, institute with history of diagnosing political dissidents as insane; detained artist's works have included nailing his scrotum to Red Square.
